candidates.title: Replace ruma_common::serde::urlencoded with serde_html_form

Less code to maintain! (in theory, the crate is mine and doesn't currently have extra maintainers but that can change)

Fixes #1331.

candidates.title: Add support for getting an event by timestamp
candidates.body:
According to [this spec PR](https://github.com/matrix-org/matrix-spec/pull/1366) and [MSC3030](https://github.com/matrix-org/matrix-spec-proposals/pull/3030).

I'm not 100% sure that the right place for direction is in the `api` module, but I didn't want to create a module just for it, like `RoomType`.










<!-- Replace -->
----
Preview Removed
<!-- Replace -->

candidates.title: feat: add support for unstable-msc3931/3932 style push conditions parsing
candidates.body:
Seeing 
```
:WARN :matrix_sdk_base::client:crates/matrix-sdk-base/src/client.rs:529:Failed to deserialize a global account data event error=Error("unknown variant `org.matrix.msc3931.room_version_supports`, expected one of `event_match`, `contains_display_name`, `room_member_count`, `sender_notification_permission`", line: 1, column: 1018)
```

because the server sends 3931 field values we don't have support for yet. This PR adds support for it behind another `unstable-`-flag. Not sure if we need/want to have another fallback support in case the flag is not activated.

Closes #1431.







<!-- Replace -->
----
Preview: https://pr-1405--ruma-docs.surge.sh
<!-- Replace -->

candidates.title: Bump MSRV to 1.64
candidates.body:
Unblocks https://github.com/ruma/ruma/pull/1350

This is required for ruma-common to be able to take advantage of const eval string-splitting functionality.

candidates.title: Add `VersionHistory` `const fn new`
candidates.body:
This adds a `const fn` constructor for `VersionHistory`, bringing us one step closer to a generic `metadata!` macro in https://github.com/ruma/ruma/issues/1348

Blocked by https://github.com/ruma/ruma/pull/1351
